alert.note: Alert for Northern Warren; Northern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 21 at 12:46PM EST until February 23 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Northern Warren and Northern Washington Counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moderate to heavy snow Wednesday evening may mix with or occasionally change to a wintry mix of sleet and freezing rain late Wednesday night into Thursday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
